author: Victor Garcia
title: Cotton says China's leadership 'must be made to pay the price' if coronavirus came from Wuhan lab
description: Sen. Tom Cotton, R-Ark., told "Hannity" Wednesday that China's leadership "must be made to pay the price" if it is determined that the coronavirus pandemic originated in a Wuhan laboratory.
content:
